title: Australian vintage
creator_credit: Peter Thompson, Australian Wine and Brandy Corporation and Film Australia
brief_description: This film explores the development of the wine industry in Australia with particular reference to Australia’s international status as a wine producing country. Features an appearance by winemaker and writer Len Evans.
